text:
Happy Friday E-Mentors <!everyone>! :tada::beers:

Just a reminder that *your private Mentee channels will deactivate on Sunday at 11:59pm* so don't forget to round off your conversations in time (although do continue to chat away until then!)

>*A fun Friday afternoon activity for you: :dancer:* Please take 5 min to complete our quick feedback form (Link here: <https://prospela.typeform.com/to/Cer2WI>). We'd love to hear your thoughts! It will help us immensely as we build out our REAL product and for users to get more out of it in the future. :smile::smile:


_Note: We'll be sharing the final leaderboards & social impact stats in this "hello-mentors" channel early next week!_
